name: Blast Ensemble
description: A classic match 3 game. But this time you just have to click on the lines of the same shapes instead of moving them. Special tools for special cleaning of areas will drop out to help you. At each level, you are given a limited number of moves, for which you need to score the most points in addition to the main objectives to complete the level. Here you and knocking down certain types of figures and the destruction of individual blocks and the capture of various toys. The game features a huge number of levels and cute characters.
